t: Amazon.com: Music For The Masses (180 Gram Vinyl): CDs & Vinyl

t: Amazon.com: Depeche Mode / Enjoy The Silence: CDs & Vinyl
s: This is my favorite song by Depeche Mode (hands down!) I'd give it 20 stars if I could. Good versions, a great CD single at a great price, get your copy, place it in your player and just press the "Repeat Disc" button and forget about it.
